scripts.layer:create: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['layer-base/python', 'layer-ml/python'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true }); } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'EEXIST') throw e; } });"
scripts.layer:install: pnpm run layer:install-api && pnpm run layer:install-ml
scripts.layer:deploy: cdk deploy prod-stardex-layer --require-approval never && cdk deploy "*prod-stardex-backend*" --require-approval never
scripts.layer:update: pnpm run layer:create && pnpm run layer:install && pnpm run layer:deploy
scripts.layer:clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['layer-base', 'layer-ml'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch (e) { if (e.code !== 'ENOENT') throw e; } });"
